title: Attention-Focused Learning Program for Improving Golf Putting Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Real-time feedback provision utilizing digital devices (tablets, motion capture sensors).

learning_goals: Learners can achieve over 70% putting accuracy at the standard distance (2m) by the third week after practicing putting with external focus instructions (observing ball speed)
Learners can explain putting skill structure changes in three or more stages through self-assessment using the SDA-M method
Learners can improve putting consistency (standard deviation) by at least 15% compared to the initial training phase in the fourth-week comprehensive assessment
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
